formula: a(n) = 55 + 30*m + 6*m^2 where m = A027866(n). - _Zak Seidov_, May 20 2014
mathematica: lst={};Do[a=n^2+(n+1)^2+(n+2)^2+(n+3)^2+(n+4)^2+(n+5)^2;If[PrimeQ[a],AppendTo[lst,a]],{n,8!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 02 2009 *)Select[Table[Total[(n+Range[0,5])^2],{n,200}],PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 18 2011 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
